title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2293/1999 of 14 October 1999 extending the provisional authorisations of certain additives in feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2293/1999
of 14 October 1999
extending the provisional authorisations of certain additives in feedingstuffs
(Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Additives referred to in the Annex to this Regulation are authorised in accordance with Directive 70/524/EEC under the conditions laid down in this Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 October 1999.
For the Commission
David BYRNE
Member of the Commission
